title: Please help me identify this font
content:
Hi!

Could anybody help me identify this font please? I used this 3 years ago, had my pc reformated and I only had this image. Any response will be greatly appreciated.

Thanks!

Jerome

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821092225im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_3772.png)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Untitled-1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821092225/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_23.png) | 20.82 KB |
author: dyappoy

comments.content:
If you look at the Typophile Forum page -- where all forums are listed, Under the <cite>General Discussion</cite> listing -- where you've just posted -- you see this:

> All topics are welcome— **except font ID requests.**

Fortunately for people wanting fonts identified, there is a completely seperate forum, frequented by people who delight in answering such questions

[http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821092225/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")

For me, I can only help by telling you it isn't Times, Helvetica, or Comic Sans.
